channel.title: incremental on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in incremental on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Clicking Bad
item.description: 15:20 Wednesday 20 June 2018 JST Now at JB wondering why I am watching this incremental game (Clicking Bad)instead of doing work on AB. In the game, I have 500M units of product, so I am thinking about adding a whole new component to the game of buying warehouses, which would be needed to keep up with the inventory else it could be stolen, and perhaps increase the threat of raids.
